step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting with fists closed and arms in front of your chest. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles here.
Nicely done opening your fingers and extending your arms. Keep exhaling and relaxing your muscles as you move.
Excellent execution of opening fingers and extending arms. Ensure you are fully exhaling and relaxing your muscles.
Good job returning to the starting position. Remember to close your fists and inhale while tightening your muscles.
Great work completing the first repetition! Keep focusing on controlled movements and breathing.
Starting the second rep well. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles as you bring your arms in and close your fists.
Good job opening your fingers and extending your arms. Continue to exhale and relax your muscles during this movement.
Excellent form on this step. Ensure you are fully exhaling and relaxing your muscles as you extend your arms.
Well done returning to the start. Remember to close your fists and inhale, tightening your muscles.
Fantastic job completing the second repetition! You're doing great with the arm movements and muscle engagement.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Horizontal Pumping exercise! Remember to focus on closing your fists and tightening muscles while inhaling, then opening your fingers and relaxing as you exhale and extend your arms. Keep up the good work!
